r.d: Mailparse is an extension for parsing and working with email messages. It can deal with rfc822 and rfc2045 (MIME) compliant messages.
r.n: - fix #29 Segmentation fault with ISO-2022-JP Subject header - fix #30 Segmentation fault with UTF-8 encoded X-MS-Iris-MetaData header - revert fix #81403 mailparse_rfc822_parse_addresses drops escaped quotes
